channel.title: 99 for skillcapes and hoods?
channel.description: well the title says it all how do i make 99 in that skill for 99 for the skill cape and hood? got a tut or anything to help?

item.title: 99 for skillcapes and hoods?
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

Go into client.java
Search for something like this.

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {

You should see this, [code] for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 100;

}

[/code]
Just change the 100â€™s in there to whatever level you want

Someone else can tell you how to change the skillcapes,

Read full topic
